figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Remote ischaemic preconditioning (RIPC) and control group (CG) protocols.

figure_2.title: Figure 2.
figure_2.caption: Flowchart for patient inclusion and follow-up: screening, inclusion and exclusion, randomisation, baseline testing, and postintervention testing.

claims.sentence:
Randomisation
Participants will be randomly assigned (1:1) via EPIDAT version 4.2 software (Figure 1) to one of two groups: Group 1, RIPC; Group 2, the control group (CG).

Figure 2 presents the flowchart detailing patient inclusion and follow-up steps, including screening, eligibility criteria, randomisation, baseline assessments, and evaluations after the intervention.
